pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Projects/SystemSettings" - KDE TechBase
textBeforeTable: These modules are currently displayed in System Settings Y = Yes; N = No; M = Maybe Computer Administration Modules Check that User:DarioAndres/SS3 is implemented. 2009-03-11: polkit-Qt is there meanwhile, yeah! Now we just could need a way to provide a more portable implementation :) (sebsauer) See also PolicyKit and PolicyKit-KDE - looking through the API it seems to be overall complicated to implement that for e.g. the datetime-kcm compared to the KDE3-way plus it does NOT seem to be portable (so, we would need a portable wrapper-lib around it). All in all it sounds like a lot of overhead imho (sebsauer) See also commit r559289: "remove the ability to embed KCMs running as root: the GUI should run with user privileges and only the writing or calling of programs should run as root" Reimplement administrator mode modules using minimal reader/writer root processes TODO Hook up to KCMultiWidget etc Custom Delegate Custom KCategoryDrawer with icon SortFilterProxyModel to replace KCMSearch. This should use X-KDE-Weight to set sort order and set a SearchHitRole on the items so that the custom delegate can dim them. Use KCategorizedView KCModuleModel Port to Interview and use KCategorizedView from
